pp1.6:2.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati,
pp1.6:2.1_1: tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ.
pp1.6:2.2_0: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati,
pp1.6:2.2_1: na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ.
pp1.6:2.3_0: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp1.6:2.3_1: diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti sāvakapāramiñca pāpuṇāti.
pp1.6:2.4_0: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp1.6:2.5_0: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp1.6:2.5_1: na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti,
pp1.6:2.6_0: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp1.6:2.6_1: na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti,
